transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan madam.
Customer: Haan Manish sir meri na abhi Shailesh sir se baat hui thi. To unka concern ye hai ki wo ye bol rahe hain ki aap unke previous partner the. Abhi wo unki ye company hai aur aap jo hai ye company use kar rahe hain aur hum logon ne GST.
Customer: Hmm. Main wahi bolne wala tha abhi aapko.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji haan.
Customer: Haan. Abhi hamara hai na separation ho gaya hai, right?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan. To abhi jo maine karwaya tha na, wo maine khud ka account se aapko clear karwaya tha. To IndiaMART ka hai na subscription. To aap unko bol dijiye, theek hai hum log ye close kara de rahe hain yahan pe.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan haan, theek hai.
Customer: Aap aap unko aisa bol dijiye phone karke ki theek hai hum ye account jo hai wo close kara de rahe hain. Haan na? Update karke close kara dijiye. Aur mera jo apna Maho Trading Corporation wala hai na, usme aap convert kar dijiye.
Customer: Aap ye account, sir main bata deti hun. Wo unki details jo hai wo automatically update ho jayengi kyunki GST se hum logon ne details check kar li. Theek hai? To details jo hai wo unhi ki updated hai. Wahi aur upar se proprietor aisa kuch partner mention nahi hai, proprietor mention hai. Ek Nirav karke hai aur ek ye Shailesh sir hain jinka call aaya hai. To unki details to update ho jayengi automatically. Ab ye aur dusri cheez aapka jo account hai, aap jaise bol rahe hain ki payment aapne kiya tha. Main samajh gayi aapki baat. Wo hum logon ne TrustSeal karaya tha. Aapne apne paison se karaya tha. Aap ye kehna chah rahe ho to account disable to ho jayega. But otherwise aapka dusra jo company hai jisme aap keh rahe ho ye move kar do.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Wo hum move kaise karenge sir? Kuch bhi details same nahi hai. Company to same hai hi nahi na. Company ka naam alag. Madam meri baat suniye. Main apni detail aapko dusre firm ki detail aapko de raha hun na.
Customer: Maho trading company ki na?
Customer: Haan Maho trading company ki main aapko detail provide kar deta hun. GST wagera sab mere naam pe. Nahi mere paas hai sir. Maho trading corporation ki detail hai GST mein lekin kuch bhi similar nahi hai na. DSM aur DSM mein aur Maho trading corporation mein kuch bhi similar nahi hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: To hum log kaise move karenge? Meri baat suniye. DSM speciality chemical aap disable kar dijiye aur Maho trading ko activate kar dijiye.
Customer: Achcha ek second line pe rahiye. Sir ek baar baat karna Manish sir hain line pe.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. Sir haan abhi hum logon ne na dono GST check kare hain, theek hai? Dono GST mein kuch bhi similar nahi hai sir. To main ye service aapki move nahi kara sakti hun. Haan ye hum log kar sakte hain wo to aapka disable hoga ye wala account DSM wala kyunki aapne ye payment kiya tha. Aap ye kehna chah rahe ho theek hai? To hum log Shailesh sir ko bol denge ki account disable ho jayega. But iska jo service ka duration hai ye service hai wo hum log Maho trading corporation pe live nahi kar payenge kyunki dono GST hi alag hai. Owner agar owner bhi same hote ya kuch bhi aisa.
Customer: To uska previous owner to hum log sath mein the na. Uska to maine aapko already detail diya hua tha na previously. Previous owner hum log the na sath mein tha usme. Previous owner jo maine aapko agla certificate provide kiya tha usme.
Customer: Ah achcha. To abhi haan. Dekhiye kya hua. Abhi DSM speciality chemical mein teen partner the na. Abhi ek partner main hat gaya. Barabar do partner already hai usme. Lekin main nikal gaya to mera jo alag firm hai to usme mujhe mujhe continue karwana hai matlab maine subscription karwaya hua tha apne time pe. Samajh rahe ho na? Haan main samajh gayi. Already subscription mein main maine jo aapka aapko detail provide kiya tha jo GST certificate usme mera naam already tha maine aapko de diya tha usme. To abhi mera separate jo aapne certificate mujhe DSM wala diya tha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Nahi ki isme nahi hai na sir aapka naam. Dekho main aapko bhej rahi hun. Abhi abhi meri baat suniye abhi ke isme nahi hoga but maine jo time pe activate karaya tha wo time pe tha. Abhi ke usme revise ho gaya to usme nahi hoga.
Customer: Achcha abhi ye revise ho gaya to nahi hoga but hum log to hamare paas jo details updated hai hum log to usme similarity dekhenge na ki Maho trading aur kyunki company to GST policy pe chalti hai sir. Company ko hame ye batana hai ki ye company aur ye company same person ko belong karti thi. Pehle partnership mein thi abhi partner ne apni chhod ke DSM wali apni nayi company bana li. Meri baat suniye meri baat suniye agar aisa hai to main DSM chemical chemical ke letterhead pe aapko likh ke de sakta hun ki ye DSM society chemical ke pehle owner the. Abhi inka alag se form hai Maho trading corporation aur ye form pe abhi ye Manish bhai dekh rahe hain. Aisa kuch chahiye to main aapko de sakta hun. Aap baat kar lijiye ek baar aur Shailesh bhai ka phone aata hai unko bol dijiye. Haan main ek baar baat karti hun.
Customer: Shailesh bhai ka phone aata hai to unko bol dijiye ki hum log disable kar denge.
Customer: Haan ek baar aap Shailesh sir se call bhi kar lo kyunki Shailesh sir mujhe abhi bol rahe the ki aap Manish ko call karo aur fir mujhe batao ki unse kya baat hui hai kyunki meri unse baat nahi ho pa rahi hai. To wo mujhe ye bol rahe the. Maine bola theek hai main unse baat karti hun uske baad hi kyunki OTP wagera sab aapke number pe jayega. To mujhe maine unko bataya ki main dedh saal se aapki company assist kar rahi hun. To meri unse kabhi bhi baat nahi hui hai maine unko ye bhi bata diya. To theek hai mujhe aap thoda sa time dijiye main aapko batati hun sir. Jo jo document sahi rahega main aapko call kar dungi. Aap matter samajh gaye na madam main kya bol raha hun? Haan haan main samajh gayi. Agar additionally bhi kuch payment rahega na mujhe active karana hai mujhe IndiaMART ko run rakhna hai right right. Theek hai. Wo chahe Maho trading corporation ho either kuch bhi. To mujhe agar isme additionally kuch lena padega na subscription main already isme future ka soch raha hun ki export ke liye kara lo. Theek hai export ke liye chalu kar raha hun abhi. To mujhe ye to lena hi hai. To theek hai. Bas abhi ye to kya separation aa gaya beech mein to isme problem ye ho gaya. To abhi mera ek request hai aapse kyunki hamara communication achcha hai bahut time se baat kar rahe hain. To aap ek baar Shailesh bhai ko phone kar dijiye ki Manish Manish sir ne hamare aage se itna discussion nahi hua tha lekin abhi do teen dinon se unka phone aaya tha disable karne ke liye khali aap utna bol dijiye. Ki unhone close karne ke liye bola hai hum log jaldi usko update karke close karwa denge disable karwa denge itna khali statement aap unko de dijiye Shailesh bhai ko. Theek hai main isse na mere ko ek baar baat karni padegi sir. Kyunki na already concern jo hai wo legal team mein chala ja chuka hai aur legal team na as per GST hi work karti hai. Jo GST mein hoga wo log wo details update kar denge. Theek hai but ye jo aap mera aur aapka discussion hai obviously uska kuch na kuch solution hum log ek baar main baat kar leti hun sir se jo bhi solution hoga fir main aapko update karti hun thoda sa time dijiye sir aur main unko Shailesh sir ko bhi bata dungi. Technically to sir unki details unse bhi abhi hum log letter head pe likh ke lenge aisa nahi hai. Uske baad unki details bhi update karenge. To main ek baar unse bhi baat kar leti hun aur sir se baat karke aapko final update deti hun sir kya kar sakte hain theek hai. Theek hai. Close karwa dijiyega aur aur mujhe Maho trading chalu mera mera jo bhi tha na maine aapko fact bata diya ki aisa aisa hua hai. Haan haan main samajh gayi aapki baat wo aapne jo bataya mujhe wo main samajh gayi. Theek hai aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye main aapko update karti hun sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to move account to Maho trading.

- Account details not matching with GST details.

- Wants executive to inform Shailesh about closing account.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the GST policy.

- Executive assured to discuss with senior.

- Executive will update after discussing with Shailesh.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, account, subscription, details, disable
